attributes.action: Get our Soldiers out of Afghan.
attributes.additional_details: I am a Mother of a Soldier who has served and is going to serve again in March 2012, I am sick to the stomach of hearing of the Injured. Death's, Repatuations of our young ones and no real goal, what is the goal? There seems to be no solution. I would like an end to this War, Pull our Women and Men out. Save Wive's from being Widow's, Parents from losing their Children, Children living without a role model Mother or Father. Dear Government get our troops out now. PLEASE.
